front.title: Generating KDC Referrals to locate Kerberos realms

abstract.t: The draft documents a new method for a Kerberos Key Distribution Center (KDC) to respond to client requests for tickets as is used in Microsoft's Windows 2000 implementation of Kerberos. The KDC will handle requests for principals in other realms by returning either a referral error or a cross-realm TGT to another realm on the referral path.
